original: Linderstam, Karl Johan Efraim, civilingenjör, Norrköping, f. 6/9/81 i Jönköp. G. 1. 16 m. Elsa Eiserman, d. 38; 2. 42 m. Ruth Alm. Barn: Kerstin f. 17, Ingrid 26. — Lärov:stud. i Jönköp. 93-00, elev v. tekn. elem:sk. i Borås 00-03, KTH (M) 09-12. Stud:-res. t. Tyskl. o. Engl. 26, 27, 30 o. 34. Anst. v. Arboga Mek. Verkst. 03, Strömisfors Bruk 04-06, Jönköp. Mek. Verkst. A-B 06-09 o. 12-13, Sthlms gasverks nybyggn :kont. 13-16, A-B Vaporackumulator i Sthlm 16-18, ång-tekn. v. Holmens Bruks & Fabr. A-B i Norrköp. sed. 18. Sekr. i Norrköp. polytekn. fören. 31, led. av tax:nd. Skr.: Värme o. ventil, i pappersmaskinsalar, Energie-Verhältnisse beim Papiertrocknen (världskraftkonf. 33), avsnittet om värmeåtervinning i Sv. Ing:handbok (45) m. fl. Hobby: klass, språk.
translated: Linderstam, Karl Johan Efraim, civil engineer, Norrköping, b. 6/9/1881 in Jönköping. Married 1st in 1916 to Elsa Eiserman, d. 1938; 2nd in 1942 to Ruth Alm. Children: Kerstin b. 1917, Ingrid b. 1926. Education: Student in Jönköping 1893-1900, student at technical school in Borås 1900-1903, Royal Institute of Technology (M) 1909-1912. Studied abroad in Germany and England in 1926, 1927, 1930, and 1934. Employment: Worked at Arboga Mekaniska Verkstad in 1903, Strömsholms Bruk from 1904-1906, Jönköping Mekaniska Verkstad A-B from 1906-1909 and 1912-1913, Stockholm Gasworks new construction office from 1913-1916, A-B Vaporackumulator in Stockholm from 1916-1918, and as a steam engineer at Holmens Bruks & Fabriks A-B in Norrköping since 1918. Secretary of the Norrköping Polytechnic Association in 1931, member of the tax board. Writings: Heat and ventilation in paper machine halls, Energy ratios in paper drying (World Power Conference 1933), section on heat recovery in the Swedish Engineering Handbook (1945) among others. Hobby: classical languages.

structured.name: Karl Johan Efraim Linderstam
structured.description: Civil engineer from Norrköping known for his work in various organizations and publications in the field of engineering.
